name: Cookies Underground
description:
Top Down Stealth RPG + Prop Hunt

Go Deeper to get Cookies Underground

 Story: 

You work as a freelance mercenary, one day, you get a call, from a mysterious, somewhat squeaky, employer. They ask to hire you and for you to come to a set coordinate, where they wish to inform you about a job they are hiring you for. At the place where they wished to confront you, a screen shows up. It displays a shadowy figure, they tell you about a facility and your objective. When you reach the surface of the facility, your mission starts

Gameplay:

Become Prop and find the cookie & the elevator to complete a level

Controls:

Movement: W/A/S/D

Pretend: SPACE

Team:

CREDITS:

Character Art:  Joy Yao, Eesta Liang

Environment Art: Serena Lee, Molly

Game Designer: Max Mao, Max Lay
